title: Bank
content:
A Bank is a type of scenery that allows players to deposit, store, and withdraw specific items. There is no central bank, instead some professions have a designated bank. Banks are usually cabinets, but sometimes appear as a wagon.


 * Bait Bank
 * Bones Bank
 * Equipment Bank
 * Ingredients Bank
 * Lumber Bank
 * Monument Pieces Bank
 * Potions Bank
 * Potion Reagents Bank
 * Timber Bank
